lead_paragraph: A Munich-based software developer creates an app that lets shoppers use their own Web cameras to enter a virtual dressing room to try on and buy clothes.
snippet: A Munich-based software developer creates an app that lets shoppers use their own Web cameras to enter a virtual dressing room to try on and buy clothes.

headline.main: Penney Sells Back-to-School Clothes the Digital Way
